com.compendium.core.datamodel.services
Interface IClientService

All Superinterfaces:
IService
All Known Implementing Classes: 
public interface IClientService
extends IService

The interface for the ClientService class The ClientService class provides remote services to manipuate code objects.

Author:
Sajid and Rema / Michelle Bachler
